column4: azlon_> cdm10: i put a \ for the space in the WD Passport > not to put too fine a point on it, but i hope you meant you put a backslash-space for the space, not just a backslash ;-)
i might not have the whole context here, but if you have a "simple" partition scheme (e.g. very few, or even single), you could split/resize and put your backup image on the newly freed space
i only have 8GB SSD... im on a netbook playing with linux for the first time
